PASSWORD_RESET.SUBJECT: Het wachtwoord van uw Citizen OS-account resetten

REPORT_TOPIC_REPORT_REPORTER.SUBJECT: Bedankt, we hebben uw melding ontvangen (nr. {{report.id}})

REPORT_TOPIC_REPORT_MEMBER.SUBJECT: Melding nr. {{report.id}}: uw Citizen OS-topic bevat mogelijk een overtreding van onze richtlijnen

REPORT_TOPIC_REPORT_MODERATOR.SUBJECT: Een Citizen OS-topic is gemeld (nr. {{report.id}}), modereer het alstublieft

REPORT_TOPIC_MODERATE_REPORTER.SUBJECT: Uw Citizen OS-melding nr. {{report.id}} is beoordeeld

REPORT_TOPIC_MODERATE_MEMBER.SUBJECT: Melding nr. {{report.id}}: uw Citizen OS-topic is beoordeeld door een moderator

REPORT_TOPIC_REPORT_REVIEW_MODERATOR.SUBJECT: Een gemelde (nr. {{report.id}}) Citizen OS-topic is herzien, beoordeel deze alstublieft

REPORT_TOPIC_REPORT_RESOLVE_MEMBER.SUBJECT: Melding nr. {{report.id}}: de toegang tot uw Citizen OS-topic is hersteld.

REPORT_TOPIC_REPORT_RESOLVE_REPORTER.SUBJECT: Uw melding (nr. {{report.id}}) in Citizen OS is opgelost

Bevat spam of houdt geen verband met het onderwerp

REPORT_COMMENT_CREATOR.SUBJECT: Uw argument is door de community gemeld als ongepast

REPORT_COMMENT_MODERATOR.SUBJECT: Een argument is door de community gemeld als ongepast

NOTIFICATIONS.SUBJECT: Notification from Citizen OS topic {{topicTitle}}
NOTIFICATIONS.NOTIFICATION_USER_UPDATE_TOPIC: User {{userName}} has updated a field {{fieldName}} in topic {{topicTitle}}
NOTIFICATIONS.NOTIFICATION_USER_UPDATE_TOPIC_USERACTIV: User {{userName}} has made {{groupCount}} updates to topic {{topicTitle}}
NOTIFICATIONS.NOTIFICATION_SYSTEM_UPDATE_TOPIC: System has updated a field {{fieldName}} in topic {{topicTitle}}
NOTIFICATIONS.NOTIFICATION_USER_ADD_USER_TOPIC: User {{userName}} has invited user {{userName2}} to participate in topic {{topicTitle}}
NOTIFICATIONS.NOTIFICATION_USER_ACCEPT_INVITE_TOPIC: User {{userName}} has accepted an invite to topic {{topicTitle}}

NOTIFICATIONS.NOTIFICATION_USER_UPDATE_GROUPJOIN: Group {{groupName}}: user {{userName}} has updated some share link attributes:

NOTIFICATIONS.NOTIFICATION_USER_JOIN_GROUP: User {{userName}} has joined group {{groupName}} with access level: {{accessLevel}}
